name: untitled egyptian game
description:
This is my first time trying to use Unity. I want to migrate from Gamemaker because even though it's good, it's a monthly subscription and I don't have much money.

Also, I want to be able to make cool games in a cooler engine, and this is the coolest game around.

CONTROLS

WASD - move camera

LEFT CLICK - spawn cube

SCROLL WHEEL - zoom in/out

MIDDLE CLICK - spawn pyramid

RIGHT CLICK - spawn orb

More updates soon! This is just the start!
